🌎

Community-owned NFT based Font marketplace

While existing proprietary platforms control every aspect of the network for profit & commissions. Font.Community brings a new radical approach towards the marketplace. Decentralized – owned and managed by its users.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column content_align=”text-center”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1610964806781{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1591572840664{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”]
🔥

$FONT = NFT + DeFi + DAO

Font.Community building a decentralized network owned by a community that allows its content creators to gain the full value of their contribution and participation.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1610964872267{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_Benefits”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″]
Unlimited Benefits

Features and benefits that you have never seen before

Font.Community is a decentralised community of Font designers, users, buyers and speculators.

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
Transfer Ownership
Facility for creators to transfer the ownership of their font to anyone.
Borrow Money
Font owners can borrow money against their font from lending protocols.
Buying & Selling
The platform facilitates users to buy, sell, and trade fonts.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
Issuing the share
Creators can split the font ownership as share and start selling to the community.
Earn interest
Font owners can lend their font to earn additional interest.
No hussle way
Open, Transparent & Secure with Ethereum blockchain.
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1610964941345{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f8f9fa !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_FAQ”][vc_row content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Have a question? check these answers.

Font.Community is a decentralized community of Font designers, users, buyers, and speculators. Font.Community is built to disrupt and democratize the font marketplace.

As a creator, you can do more than just selling. With Font.Community, you can sell the ownership, issue share, borrow money, earn interest. In fact, you can raise funds for your next great font.

Great!, We already gave access to a few early adapters. You can request the access by sending email to hello@font.community

No problem, you can send us the message at our Telegram group or you can mail us anytime to hello@Font.Community.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1590021058439{border-top-width: 2px !important;border-right-width: 2px !important;border-bottom-width: 2px !important;border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e9ecef !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e9ecef !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e9ecef !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e9ecef !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 10px !important;margin-left: 20px !important;margin-right: 20px !important;}”]

Ask Us a Question

Got more questions? Feel free to contact us at email hello@Font.Community or join our Telegram.
Join our Telegram
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1614474950314{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f8f9fa !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_Testimonials”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1592393414962{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column content_align=”text-center”]
❤

What do people say about us?

We are getting love from various corners from creators, collectors to crypto enthusiasts.

Share us your love![/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/3″]

I've been looking for font NFTs for so long. Choice of font is a huge design decision now. And centralized font market is a ridiculous space that doesn't adequately reward typographers. Now it's here!

Alex Atallah
Co-founder & CTO of @OpenSea
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Are you paying attention as all digital content, including fonts, is going on-chain as NFTs?

Jake Brukhman
Founder- CoinFund

@FontCommunity : Wait for more - you're also a Font #NFT Character.

Sebastien
Co-Founder & COO Sandbox
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Great to see fonts as NFTs! Always thought about it. We believe fonts are a great use for NFTs!

TOMO FONTS
@tomofonts

If this isn't a potential gem then I don't know what is: turning fonts into NFT's. Brilliant usecase!

Stanley More
@Stanley__More
